alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Excessive Heat Watch issued July 19 at 3:17AM MDT until July 24 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerously hot conditions with temperatures up to 104 possible. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front and Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...From Saturday morning through Monday evening. * IMPACTS...Extreme heat will significantly increase the potential for heat related illnesses, particularly for those working or participating in outdoor activities.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Be prepared to drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air- conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances. This is especially true during warm or hot weather when car interiors can reach lethal temperatures in a matter of minutes.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley
